Title: Skift India Daily: Google Search Pages for Darjeeling Hotels Hacked by Fraudsters
Description: The fast-paced growth of online travel bookings makes the tourism industry a ripe target for cybercriminals. Stakeholders must therefore deploy strategies and tools to guard the sector against data breaches and malicious attacks. -Amrita Ghosh

Title: General Electric Is Getting Ready to Fire On all Cylinders
Description: Management's recent guidance was better than many had expected it to be.

Title: 2023 Layoff Tracker: Meta Planning Another Large Round Of Cuts This Week, Report Says
Description: Amazon, Alphabet, Salesforce and Disney have all slashed staff this year, citing cloudy economic forecasts.
